data.question_html:
脱式计算。
（1）< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140345867916.gif">×< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140351679885.gif">÷< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140400882910.gif">（2）< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140330070903.gif">÷< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140337367875.gif">×15
（3）24÷< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140409976889.gif">×< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140422382912.gif">（4）60÷< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140314039881.gif">×< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140321257885.gif">
data.answer_html:
（1）原式=< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140449773879.gif">÷< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140400882910.gif">=9（2）原式=< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140508164892.gif">×15=3< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140515414873.gif">
（3）原式=24÷4=6（4）原式=90×< img style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle" src="http://pic1.mofangge.com/upload/papers/x02/20110317/20110317140321257885.gif">=50
